channel.title: helm on Kubernetes From Scratch
channel.description: Recent content in helm on Kubernetes From Scratch

item.title: Helm
item.description: The package manager for Kubernetes https://helm.sh/ 安装 brew install kubernetes-helm 初始化 初始化并部署 Tiller helm init --service-account tiller --history-max 200 --tiller-image=omio/gcr.io.kubernetes-helm.tiller:v2.13.1 注意 Role-based Access Control

item.title: 关于
item.description: KFS 是 Kubernetes From Scratch 的缩写，项目命名学习 LFS (Linux From Sscrath)，同时在实践风格方面也学习 LFS。
